Text: PSSST Santas listeningSantas making his list and its time to send a few hints Its so easy with Send a hint You can let them know exactly what you want or share an idea with your Sis about the perfect gift for Mom When something catches your eye on Coldwatercreekcom just click Send a hint Well do the rest To find out how to send a little hint click the link below Here are some selections worth a hint or two Floral big shirt Quilted velvet jacket Melange jacket Knit hat Knit gloves Give Santa a helping hand Click the link below to shop Coldwater Creek Your kind of clothes Online All the time wwwcoldwatercreekcom Holiday events at the store near you Check our special events and holiday hours For locations click the link below This email was sent to HESPIRESCOM If you would rather not receive future emails from Coldwater Creek please reply to this message and type remove in the subject line We will remove your name from our email list Call tollfree to speak with a customer service representative
